item.title: Live according to the Words of the Prophets
item.description:
Live according to the Words of the Prophets by undefined Carol F. McConkie, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency given in Sunday Morning of 184th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 2014
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Carol F. McConkie, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency
